name: 洪媽益
objective:
培養正確的英語發音與腔調，並訓練學生熟悉如何使用音標記錄發音以及辨認學習者在英語發音中經常發生的問題。  課程中也介紹英語語音系統的主要規則。
This course will be concerned with English speech sounds and stress patterns, the use of phonetic symbols for transcribing pronunciation and identifying pronunciation problems. The general principles of English phonology will be introduced.
schedule:
Week 1: Course Introduction; IPA symbols
Week 2: Introductory concepts: Articulation and Acoustics
Week 3: Phonetic Transcription
Weeks 4-5: Consonants
Weeks 6-8: Vowels
Week 9: Mid-term exam
Week 10: Words and Sentences
Week 11: General Phonetics
Week 12: Syllables
Week 13: Stress
Week 14: Intonation
Week 15: Rhythm
Week 16: Phonics
Week 17: Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Exercises: 25%
Participation: 25%
Mid-term exam: 25%
Final exam: 25%
materials: Ladefoged, Peter. 2006. A course in Phonetics. 5th edition. Boston: Thomson Higher Education.
